description:
When Hinako Nakayama took on the identity of Hikaru Onigashima, she didn`t know what it would mean for her future. Now, with the support of the friends she`s made with her martial arts skills, it`s time to prove who`s the boss of Shishiku Academy!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kenka Joutou! Ai to Kobushi to Mabudachi to
Taking On All Comers! Love, Fists, and Best Bros
喧嘩上等! 愛と拳とマブダチと
